page.title: 16Leisure in Knutton
page.content: Leisure centres around Knutton Club which is open daily.Youngsters often entertain themselves on Space Invader machines,while the adults relax over drinks and pleasant conversation.Live entertainment or disco is also provided and Bingo competitions are fun for all. There is a variety of sports activities available. There are three public houses in the area,the most popular is The Forge Inn as it is central for the residents of Knutton village. Children have playing fields with slides,swings and climbing frames. Manor House is used mainly by disabled people,but during the evenings it is available for private use.The Community Centre has a "Darby and Joan" Club, Mothers and Toddlers activity group and playgroup sessions.
